typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		County as string,
		{Product Category} as string,
		{Product Brand} as string,
		{In Stock Rate} as string,
		{Agg Weight} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['cups_plates*.csv']) ~> CupsPlatesSource
CupsPlatesSource select(mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*`),
			regexReplace($$,' ','_') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReplaceSpaceWithUnderScore
ReplaceSpaceWithUnderScore derive(State = right(County, 2),
		County = left(County, length(County)-2)) ~> NewColumnState
NewColumnState select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		County,
		State,
		Product_Category,
		Product_Brand,
		In_Stock_Rate,
		Agg_Weight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RearrangeColumn
RearrangeColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CupsPlatesSink

source(output(
		Date as string,

	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReplaceSpaceWithUnderScore
ReplaceSpaceWithUnderScore derive(State = right(County, 2),
		County = left(County, length(County)-2)) ~> NewColumnState
NewColumnState select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		County,
		State,
		Product_Category,
		Product_Brand,
		In_Stock_Rate,
		Agg_Weight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RearrangeColumn
RearrangeColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FoilsWrapsSink

source(output(
		Date as string,
		County as string,
		{Product Category} as string,
		{Product Brand} as string,
		{In Stock Rate} as string,
		{Agg Weight} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['food_trash_bags*.csv']) ~> FoodTrashBagsSource
FoodTrashBagsSource select(mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*`),
			regexReplace($$,' ','_') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReplaceSpaceWithUnderScore
ReplaceSpaceWithUnderScore derive(State = right(County, 2),
		County = left(County, length(County)-2)) ~> NewColumnState
NewColumnState select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		County,
		State,
		Product_Category,
		Product_Brand,
		In_Stock_Rate,
		Agg_Weight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RearrangeColumn
RearrangeColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
